name: Forus
description: Forus is a community-based token and platform with a voting system. Token is based on three key principles: work together to create value for others; be open and welcoming to participants in your project. Forus Platform is an exchange platform which is focusing to solve two major issues, the first is scalability issues, and the other involves low liquidity in cryptocurrency markets due to high volatility or unpredictable price movements.
